title: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness

title: Obi-Wan Kenobi
summary: Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi has to save young Leia after she is kidnapped, all the while being pursued by Imperial Inquisitors and his former Padawan, now known as Darth Vader.

title: Stranger Things
summary: When a young boy disappears, his mother, a police chief and his friends must confront terrifying supernatural forces in order to get him back.

title: The Black Phone
summary: After being abducted by a child killer and locked in a soundproof basement, a 13-year-old boy starts receiving calls on a disconnected phone from the killer's previous victims.

title: The Northman
summary: From visionary director Robert Eggers comes The Northman, an action-filled epic that follows a young Viking prince on his quest to avenge his father's murder.

title: Top Gun: Maverick

title: Spider-Man: No Way Home

title: Hustle
summary: A basketball scout discovers a phenomenal street ball player while in Spain and sees the prospect as his opportunity to get back into the NBA.

title: The Godfather
summary: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty in postwar New York City transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant youngest son.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
summary: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
